official-title.#text:
To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Glendale, New
			 York.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall designate a single, unique ZIP Code applicable to the area
			 encompassing only Glendale, New York.

text.#text: Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this section, the

header.#text: Single, unique ZIP Code for Glendale, New York

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4911 IH: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Glendale, New York.
